original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postLinks as pl, posts as p, users as u, badges as b WHERE p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND pl.LinkTypeId=1 AND pl.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-04-12 15:23:59' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.Score=1 AND p.ViewCount>=0 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-02-08 18:11:37' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.Score = 1 AND posts.ViewCount >= 0 AND posts.FavoriteCount >= 0
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E5 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E3.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.LinkTypeId = 1 AND postLinks.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2011-04-12 15:23:59'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E5E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3E5.Id=E2.RelatedPostId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2011-02-08 18:11:37'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E5E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E3E5E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E3E5E2.OwnerUserId=E4.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E5E2E4 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E5E2E4 WHERE E1.PostId=E3E5E2E4.Id)
